name: Acute Viral Bronchitis
chief_complaint: I've had this nagging cough for about a week now, and it's getting worse. I feel tightness in my chest when I cough.
prognosis: Excellent with full recovery expected within 2-3 weeks
description: An acute inflammation of the bronchial tubes caused by viral infection, typically following an upper respiratory infection. Characterized by cough lasting 1-3 weeks without evidence of pneumonia.
